import React from 'react'; import { Layout, Menu } from 'antd'; import * as actions from '../store/actions/auth' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap' const { Header, Content, Footer } = Layout; class CustomLayout extends React.Component { render() { return ( <> React-Bootstrap

 ) } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { logout: () => { dispatch(actions.logout()) } } } export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CustomLayout);
